# matchFound

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the web view found a match during the search.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var matchFound: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the web view found a match, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it didn’t.
title: matchFound
